vocabulary.definition: feeling or showing confidence in oneself; self-assured
vocabulary.example: She was confident in her ability to complete the project successfully.

vocabulary.definition: the ability to speak or write a particular language easily and accurately
vocabulary.example: After years of practice, she achieved fluency in Spanish.

vocabulary.definition: famous or well-known people, especially in the entertainment industry
vocabulary.example: The event was attended by several celebrities from the film industry.

vocabulary.definition: recollections of past events or experiences
vocabulary.example: The old photographs brought back memories of their childhood.

vocabulary.definition: a specific television station or a broadcasting organization
vocabulary.example: I usually watch cooking shows on the food channel.

vocabulary.definition: sessions of instruction or learning, especially in a school or college
vocabulary.example: She prepares her lessons well in advance to ensure smooth teaching.
